translation.en: OH, MY! FUCK! LOOK WHO IT IS, MAN!
IS THAT HIM? RIGHT THERE. RIGHT OVER THERE.
PUT YOUR GUN AWAY! THERE´S PEOPLE EVERYWHERE!
-PUT YOUR FUCKING GUN AWAY! -TAKING HIM OUT.
PUT YOUR GUN DOWN, MAN. I´M SERIOUS.
YOU WANT TO GET ARRESTED?
YOU GUYS, LEAVE US ALONE.
translation.ko: - 야, 우리 좀 놔둬 - 그 녀석 거기 놔둬

translation.en: LEAVE HIM THERE! WALK AWAY FROM THE DOG! RELEASE THE DOG, ASSHOLE!
translation.ko: - 개 놔두고 가! - 개 풀어줘, 멍청아!

translation.en: LEAVE US ALONE!
-RELEASE THE DOG! -PUT THE FUCKING DOG DOWN!
RELEASE HIM!
PUT THE FUCKING GUN DOWN! PUT IT DOWN!
PUT IT DOWN!
-PUT THE FUCKING GUN DOWN! -PUT THE GUN DOWN!
MY NAME IS JULIAN.
TODAY IS A SPECIAL DAY
translation.ko: 제 이름은 줄리안입니다 오늘은 특별한 날입니다

translation.en: BECAUSE I´M FINALLY GETTING OUT OF PRISON.
I´VE BEEN LOOKING FORWARD TO THIS DAY FOR THE PAST 18 MONTHS.
MY NAME´S RICKY, AND I´VE BEEN IN HERE FOR ABOUT 18 MONTHS NOW.
translation.ko: 제 이름은 리키입니다 여기에서 18개월 동안 있었죠

translation.en: I´M GETTING OUT TODAY, THANK FUCK.
WELL, YOU GUYS ARE GONNA GET TO KNOW RICKY, I THINK.
translation.ko: 여러분도 리키에 대해 알게 될 거예요

translation.en: AND, UH, BECAUSE I KNOW YOU GUYS
WANT TO FOLLOW HIM AROUND, AS WELL, WHICH IS COOL.
translation.ko: 따라 다니고 싶어 하는 거 알아요, 괜찮아요

translation.en: I TELL YOU ONE THING, TONIGHT I AM GETTING DRUNK AT JULIAN´S.
translation.ko: 저 오늘 밤 줄리안 집에서 술 취하게 마실 거예요

translation.en: AND IT´S GONNA BE AWESOME.
IF YOU GUYS WANT TO COME TAPE IT, THAT´S FINE,
BUT WE ARE GONNA GET REALLY DRUNK. IT´S GONNA BE WICKED.
translation.ko: 하지만 정말 많이 취할 겁니다 장난 아닐 거예요

translation.en: HOPEFULLY THERE´LL BE A BIT OF DOPE AROUND, TOO.
I´VE BEEN, LIKE, KIND OF LIKE A TEACHER TO HIM, I GUESS.
AND I´M SICK OF TEACHING HIM. I´M GONNA GET OUT OF PRISON.
translation.ko: 인제 가르치는 것도 지겨워요. 감옥에서 나가면

translation.en: I´M GONNA MOVE BACK TO THE TRAILER PARK.
I´M GONNA LIVE A GOOD, CLEAN LIFE. I´VE MATURED NOW.
translation.ko: 착하고 깨끗한 삶을 살 겁니다. 전 성숙해졌어요

translation.en: THINGS ARE GONNA BE TOTALLY DIFFERENT.
I DO BLAME RICKY. OF COURSE I DO.
LIKE, EVERYBODY KNOWS THAT HE´S THE REASON WHY I WENT TO JAIL IN THE FIRST PLACE.
translation.ko: 제가 처음 감옥에 간 게 녀석 탓이라는 건 모두 알아요

translation.en: YOU KNOW, RICKY DOESN´T THINK.
SO, YOU KNOW, I´M NOT GONNA HANG OUT WITH HIM ANYMORE.
translation.ko: 더는 그 녀석과 어울리지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: I´M JUST GONNA LOOK OUT FOR NUMBER ONE, WHICH IS ME.
translation.ko: 제일 중요한 것만 보려고요. 저 자신 말이에요

translation.en: NO MORE RICKY.
JULIAN CAN FRIG OFF IF THAT´S WHAT HE´S TELLING YOU
translation.ko: 그렇게 말했다면 줄리안이 정신이 나간 거죠

translation.en: ´CAUSE IT´S NOT MY FAULT. IT´S JULIAN´S FAULT WE WENT TO JAIL.
translation.ko: 제 잘못이 아니었거든요 감옥 간 건 그 녀석 탓이에요

translation.en: HE´S THE ONE FORCE-FEEDING ME DRUGS AND EVERY OTHER GODDAMN THING.
translation.ko: 제가 마약이며 나쁜 짓을 하게 한 녀석이라고요

translation.en: IT´S NOT MY FAULT.
SO, YOU KNOW, IF THAT´S WHAT HE SAYS, THAT´S FINE.
translation.ko: 그러니까 그 녀석이 그렇게 말했다면, 뭐 괜찮아요

translation.en: IT DOESN´T MATTER ANYWAY, BECAUSE THE COUNSELORS TOLD ME
IT´S SOCIETY´S FAULT, NOT MY FAULT.
AND IF JULIAN´S GONNA BE LIKE THAT, THEN FINE.
translation.ko: 그리고 줄리안이 그렇게 할 거라면 좋아요

translation.en: I´M GONNA BLAME IT ON HIM,
translation.ko: 저는 그 녀석 탓을 할 거예요

translation.en: ´CAUSE IT´S HIS FAULT HE WENT TO JAIL THREE TIMES.
translation.ko: 걔가 감옥을 세 번 간 건 그 녀석 잘못이에요

translation.en: I DON´T NEED JULIAN ANYMORE.
RIGHT ON, MAN. I THOUGHT YOU LEFT. NO, NO, NO, RICKY, GET YOUR OWN CAB.
translation.ko: - 나 기다려 준 거야? - 아니, 다른 택시 잡아

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
YOU´RE GETTING YOUR OWN CAB. YOU´RE NOT SHARING MY CAB.
translation.ko: - 무슨 소리야? - 다른 택시 잡으라고 - 같이 안 탈 거야 - 트레일러 파크로 가잖아!

translation.en: GET OUT OF HERE. WE´RE JUST GOING BACK TO THE TRAILER PARK!
translation.ko: - 같이 안 탈 거야 - 트레일러 파크로 가잖아!

translation.en: YOU GOT ANY MONEY?
-NO, THAT´S WHY I NEED A RIDE. -WELL, GET YOUR OWN CAB.
translation.ko: - 없으니까 태워 달라지 - 그냥 다른 택시 잡아

translation.en: THAT´S THE WAY YOU WANT TO TREAT ME, IS IT, ON-CAMERA? ON TV? HERE´S YOUR BAG.
translation.ko: 그게 날 대하는 방식이야? 카메라가 있는데? TV에?

translation.en: DON´T THROW MY SHIT.
translation.ko: - 자, 네 가방 - 내 가방 던지지 마

translation.en: COULD YOU GUYS TURN THAT OFF?
IF YOU´VE EVER BEEN IN JAIL BEFORE,
THERE´S NOTHING BETTER THAN GETTING OUT OF JAIL
translation.ko: 감옥에서 나와서 집으로 가는 것보다 더 좋은 건

translation.en: AND COMING HOME.
GEE, SHE´S GOTTEN BIGGER.
translation.ko: 이런, 저 여자 살이 더 쪘네

translation.en: RICKY AND JULIAN?
WELL, FOR THE MOST PART, THEY´RE RESPONSIBLE
translation.ko: "래히 트레일러 파크 책임자" 대부분 트레일러 파크가 망가진 건 그들 짓이죠

translation.en: FOR RUINING THIS TRAILER PARK.
translation.ko: 대부분 트레일러 파크가 망가진 건 그들 짓이죠

translation.en: USED TO BE PEACEFUL AND QUIET HERE.
YOU KNOW, WHAT GETS ME MOST IS, ALL THE YOUNG KIDS LOOK UP TO THEM.
translation.ko: 근데, 어린 애들이 녀석들을 따른다는 거죠

translation.en: I MEAN, I GOT KIDS FLYING AROUND HERE THROWING BOTTLES AT PEOPLE,
GROWING DOPE, SQUEALING TIRES, JUMPING MOTORCYCLES OVER TRAILERS.
translation.ko: 대마초 기르고, 시끄럽고 오토바이로 트레일러 위로 뛰고

translation.en: THE LIST GOES ON.
AND I´VE BEEN PARK SUPERVISOR HERE FOR GOING ON 16 YEARS.
I´VE SEEN IT ALL, BUT THOSE TWO,
translation.ko: 많은 것을 봤지만 그 두 녀석

translation.en: PARTICULARLY RICKY, THEY´RE THE WORST.
GIVE ME YOUR SMOKES, GORDON. GIVE ME YOUR FRIGGIN´ SMOKES.
translation.ko: 그 거 내놔, 고든 그 담배 내놓으라고

translation.en: YOU OWE ME 15 BUCKS, MAN!
COME ON, I KNOW YOU´VE GOT SOME SMOKES HERE SOMEWHERE.
translation.ko: 네가 여기 어디다 담배 감춘 것 알아

translation.en: OKAY, RICKY, LET HIM UP!
-RICKY, OFF! -COME ON.
GET OFF HIM, MAN! LET GO OF HIS FOOT.
-GIVE ME YOUR SMOKES, MAN! -LET HIM GO, RICKY!
translation.ko: - 담배 좀 내놓으라고! - 놔 줘, 리키!

translation.en: GET OUT OF HERE. RICKY!
-FRIG OFF, RANDY! -RANDY, BACK OFF.
-YOU FRIG OFF! -BACK OFF! STAY CLEAR!
WHAT WAS IT LIKE IN JAIL, HEY, BUDDY?
WHERE´S JULIAN, RICKY? WHERE ARE YOU STAYING, RICK?
translation.ko: - 줄리안은 어디 있냐, 리키? - 어디에 있냐, 리키?

translation.en: AT THE FUCK-OFF HOTEL, LAHEY.
HAVE SOME RESPECT HERE. MR. LAHEY´S THE PARK SUPERVISOR.
translation.ko: 존경심을 좀 보여봐 래히 씨는 파크 책임자라고

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU, HIS NEW ASSISTANT? YES, I AM!
WELL, THAT´S PRETTY FUCKED UP!
translation.ko: "랜디 트레일러 파크 보조 관리원" 야, 그거 정말 엿 같네!

translation.en: -THIS IS RICKY´S GIRL. -I MISSED YOU.
I MISSED YOU, TOO.
IS RICKY OUT OF JAIL, TOO?
YEAH.
ARE YOU GONNA COME AND VISIT MY MOMMY?
translation.ko: 우리 집에 와서 엄마 만날 거예요?

translation.en: UH, I DON´T KNOW. MAYBE.
YOU´RE OUT OF JAIL. YOU´VE GOT NO PLACE TO LIVE?
I GOT PLENTY OF PLACES TO LIVE. I COULD STAY AT ANY ONE OF THESE TRAILERS
translation.ko: 살 곳 많아, 트레일러 아무 데나 머물 수 있어

translation.en: ´CAUSE PEOPLE HERE LIKE ME, NOT LIKE YOU DICKS, ALL RIGHT?
translation.ko: 여기 사람들이 날 좋아하니까 너희와는 다르지, 알겠냐?

translation.en: THINGS HAVE CHANGED, RICK.
THINGS HAVE CHANGED, HAVE THEY?
YEAH, YOU´RE GONNA HAVE TO KEEP YOUR NOSE CLEAN, RICKY.
translation.ko: 나쁜 짓 안 하는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: SMOKES -- LET´S GO. GIVE ME SOME SMOKES.
I´VE ONLY GOT TWO LEFT. I´M NOT GIVING YOU ANY.
translation.ko: 두 개비 남았는데 너한테는 안 준다

translation.en: YOU´RE A FUCKING DICK.
AND, LAHEY, YOU CAN GO FUCK YOURSELF, OKAY?
STAY OUT OF MY BUSINESS.
WHAT A FREAKING JERK, MAN.
RICKY´S BACK.
NICE. THIS IS WHERE I LIVE. YOU KNOW, LEAVE THIS PLACE FOR 18 MONTHS
translation.ko: 여기가 내가 사는 곳입니다 18개월을 떠나 있었지요

translation.en: AND LET CORY AND TREVOR STAY HERE, AND LOOK WHAT THEY DO.
translation.ko: 코리와 트레보가 머물게 했는데 이 꼴 좀 보세요

translation.en: WHEN JULIAN GETS BACK, IT´S GONNA BE SO COOL.
THE WHOLE CREW´S GONNA HANG OUT AGAIN.
WE´RE GONNA ROCK THE TRAILER PARK LIKE WE USED TO,
SO WE´RE GONNA CLEAN THE PLACE UP. IT´S A LITTLE BIT -- IT´S A LITTLE MESSY NOW AND EVERYTHING,
translation.ko: 그래서 여길 좀 치우려고요 여기저기 좀 지저분하지만

translation.en: BUT WE´VE GOT LOTS OF TIME TO CLEAN IT UP.
WE´LL HAVE IT LOOKING AS GOOD AS IT WAS WHEN HE LEFT.
WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO MY TRAILER, BOYS?
translation.ko: 내 트레일러에 도대체 무슨 짓을 한 거야?

translation.en: OKAY, CHILL. THERE´S THIS GUY NAMED CYRUS.
HE JUST MOVED IN HERE.
THERE´S NOTHING WE COULD DO ABOUT IT.
HE HAS A GUN AND HE´S NUTS.
YEAH, I MOVED INTO HIS TRAILER.
NICE LITTLE SPOT.
THE WAY I SEE IT, THIS FUCKING JULIAN GUY,
HE LOST HIS PRIVILEGES WHEN HE WENT OFF TO CON COLLEGE.
translation.ko: 감방에 갈 때 이 모든 것을 잃은 겁니다

translation.en: YOU SEE, I´M THE GUY THAT OWNS THE TRAILER NOW.
I´M RUNNING THE TRAILER PARK.
AND IF THAT BIG, TOUGH, FUCKING GUY COMES RUNNING AROUND HERE
translation.ko: 그 덩치 크고 터프한 새끼가 여기 오면

translation.en: THROWING HIS LITTLE BIT OF WEIGHT AROUND, WELL, THEN FUCK OFF!
WE´LL HELP YOU FIND A NEW PLACE TO LIVE, JULIAN.
translation.ko: 우리가 새로운 곳을 찾도록 도와줄게요, 줄리안

translation.en: THIS IS MY PLACE, YOU IDIOT!
I´M DISAPPOINTED IN YOU GUYS.
GONE FOR 18 MONTHS -- YOU KNEW I WAS GONNA BE HOME TODAY.
translation.ko: 18개월간 떠나 있었고 오늘 돌아온다는 것 알고 있었지

translation.en: SHIT HAPPENS. THIS TIME IT´S NOT OUR FAULT.
translation.ko: 거지 같은 일이 있었어요 이번은 우리 잘못도 아니고

translation.en: SHUT UP!
YOU GUYS LET ME DOWN.
YEAH, MAN, BUT CYRUS, LIKE,
HE KILLED A KID WHEN HE WAS IN REFORM SCHOOL AND SHIT.
AND HE WAS, LIKE -- GOT EVEN HARDER WHEN HE WAS THERE,
AND HE STOLE CARS, AND HE HAS A 9 MILLIMETER.
AND LAHEY´S AFRAID TO DO ANYTHING
´CAUSE HE´S WORRIED ABOUT GETTING KNOCKED OUT BY HIM, TOO.
IT´S LIKE HE´S THE NEW PARK KING OR SOMETHING, MAN.
translation.ko: 그 사람이 파크의 새로운 왕 같이 굴어요

translation.en: SHIT CHANGES, MAN.
-HE´S NOT EVEN FROM THE PARK. -YEAH, MAN.
HE´S FRONTING TO BE FROM THE PARK,
´CAUSE HE THINKS IT´S COOL TO LIVE IN A TRAILER PARK.
translation.ko: 왜냐하면 트레일러 파크에서 사는 게 멋지다고 생각하니까요

translation.en: SO WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?
I DON´T KNOW.
BUT I KNOW WHAT YOU GUYS ARE GONNA DO.
translation.ko: 하지만, 너희가 뭘 할 건지는 알고 있지

translation.en: YOU´RE GONNA START CLEANING UP THIS MESS.
translation.ko: 너희는 이 지저분한 것들을 치워야 할 거야

translation.en: NOW!
I DON´T THINK WE GOT ANY CLEANERS.
CLEAN IT UP!
WHAT ARE YOU GUYS TAPING IN HERE? YOU HAVE TO HAVE PERMISSION.
A FRIEND OF MINE´S DOING A DOCUMENTARY. DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.ko: 내 친구가 다큐멘터리를 만드는 중이니, 걱정 마

translation.en: -ALL RIGHT. -WHAT?
LOOK, I NEED SOME STUFF, AND I COULD ROB YOU
translation.ko: 이봐, 내가 뭐가 좀 필요해서 너한테 뺐을 수 있어

translation.en: OR YOU COULD JUST GIVE IT TO ME -- IT´S UP TO YOURSELF, SO...
translation.ko: 아니면, 그냥 네가 주던가 네가 알아서 해...

translation.en: -YOU´RE RICKY, RIGHT? -YEAH, MAN.
YOU CAN HAVE WHATEVER YOU WANT. I DON´T CARE.
translation.ko: 갖고 싶은 거 다 갖고 가 난 상관없어

translation.en: OH, RIGHT ON. GIVE ME FOUR PACKS OF SMOKES.
translation.ko: - 오, 좋아 - 담배 네 갑 줘라

translation.en: AND I´LL TAKE THESE FLOWERS HERE.
translation.ko: 그리고, 이 꽃 좀 가지고 갈게

translation.en: SMOKES! GRAB MY SMOKES THERE.
UH, I WAS IN -- I WAS HERE FIRST, THERE, BUD.
translation.ko: 음, 내가 먼저... 내가 먼저 왔어, 친구

translation.en: WHAT´S THAT CAMERA DOING HERE?
translation.ko: 그 카메라는 여기서 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: NONE OF YOUR FUCKING BUSINESS, ACTUALLY.
OBVIOUSLY YOU DON´T KNOW WHO THE FUCK I AM.
translation.ko: 보아하니 넌 내가 누군지 아무것도 모르는구나

translation.en: -OBVIOUSLY YOU DON´T KNOW -- -THE NAME IS CYRUS. CYRUS.
AND I DON´T GIVE A FUCK WHO YOU ARE.
translation.ko: 그리고 난 네가 누군지 상관 안 해

translation.en: BETTER CHILL OUT THERE, HEAVY METAL DICK.
YEAH? WELL, YOU GO BACK TO THE BOWLING ALLEY YOU CAME FROM, HELMET HEAD.
translation.ko: 그래? 네가 있던 볼링장으로 돌아가 봐

translation.en: YOU´RE FUCKING LUCKY I´M ON PROBATION!
translation.ko: 너 아주 운 좋다 내가 집행 유예 기간이라!

translation.en: -IS THAT RIGHT? -YEAH.
SEE YA!
THAT´S IT. BYE-BYE!
THAT´LL BE -- WAIT, CYRUS, YOU DIDN´T PAY.
translation.ko: 그럼, 기다려 사이러스 돈 안 냈잖아

translation.en: FUCK OFF!
YEAH! YEAH!
I´M J-ROC, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.ko: 난 제이락입니다 무슨 말인 줄 알죠?

translation.en: "J" TO THE R-O-C UP IN THIS.
-THIS HERE´S MY BOY "T," TYRONE. -WHAT´S UP, NOW?
-THIS HERE´S MR. GREEN. -WHAT´S UP?
AND THAT´S HYDRO IN THE BACK.
DOUBLE CHEESE, NO BACON. FOR REAL, FOR REAL.
translation.ko: - 더블 치즈, 베이컨 빼고 - 진짜로, 진짜로

translation.en: A´IGHT. A´IGHT. A´IGHT. PEACE.
HEY, WHAT´S UP?
-WHAT´S UP, MAN? -HEY, MAN.
HOW ARE YOU DOING, TYRONE?
-GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN. -GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN.
WELCOME BACK.
WHAT´S GOING ON, MAN? NOT MUCH, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING.
translation.ko: - 별일 없어? - 없지, 무슨 말인지 알지?

translation.en: WHAT´S GOING ON, MAN? DOING ALL RIGHT. IT´S ALL GOOD.
translation.ko: - 별일 없어? - 다 좋아, 모두 좋아

translation.en: SO HOW ARE THINGS GOING?
WHAT´S WRONG?
ME AND "T" GOT SOME BAD NEWS, "G."
YO, CYRUS, MAN.
HE ALL UP IN THIS PARK CONTROLLING ALL THE LIQUOR,
translation.ko: 녀석이 이 파크를 지배하고 주류 판매 통제하고

translation.en: SELLING ALL THE DOPE, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
GOT A GUN, RUNNING AROUND ACTING HARD WITH EVERYBODY.
translation.ko: 총도 갖고 있고 모두를 거칠게 대해

translation.en: YOU´RE NOT THE KING OF THE PARK ANYMORE.
translation.ko: 형이 이제 더는 파크의 왕이 아니라고요

translation.en: BOYS, LISTEN UP, ALL RIGHT?
I´M OUT OF JAIL NOW.
THIS IS MY TRAILER. THIS IS MY HOME.
I´M NOT WORRIED ABOUT CYRUS, ALL RIGHT?
translation.ko: 난 사이러스는 걱정 안 해 알았어?

translation.en: DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
-COME ON! -A´IGHT.
SO WHAT´S GOING ON?
WE DOIN´ ALL RIGHT.
WE BE DOPE WHEN THE NEW N.W.A. COME OUT, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.ko: 새 N.W.A 나오면 멋질 거야, 내 말 알지?

translation.en: I HAVEN´T SEEN LUCY AND TRINITY SINCE TRINITY´S 7th BIRTHDAY.
translation.ko: 트리니티 일곱 살 생일 후로 루시, 트리니티를 못 봤어

translation.en: NO, IT WAS HER 8th BIRTHDAY.
NO, NO, IT WAS HER 7th BIRTHDAY, I THINK.
BUT ANYWAY, I WAS IN JAIL FOR HER 7th OR 8th BIRTHDAY,
AND, YOU KNOW, THEY NEVER REALLY GOT A CHANCE
translation.ko: 그리고, 뭐 내가 감옥에 있는 동안

translation.en: TO COME VISIT ME IN JAIL.
A YEAR AND A HALF IS QUITE A LONG TIME TO GO
WITHOUT SEEING YOUR DAUGHTER
OR THE WOMAN YOU LOVE, FOR THAT MATTER, I GUESS.
RIGHT ON, BOYS! BUBBLES!
HOW ARE YOU DOING, BUDDY?
-IT´S JULIAN. -GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN.
THAT´S MY BEST FRIEND JULIAN.
WHAT´S UP?
WHAT ARE YOU DOING? HOME FROM JAIL?
YEAH, GOT OUT TODAY.
WHO´S THIS GUY? WHAT AM I ON THE TV FOR?
I´M JUST DOING A LITTLE DOCUMENTARY THING, YOU KNOW.
HOW ARE YOU DOING?
SO WHAT´S GOING ON, ANYWAY?
WELL, I DON´T KNOW IF YOU WERE IN THERE YET,
translation.ko: 글쎄, 파크 안에 들어가 봤는지 모르지만

translation.en: BUT SOME DICKHEAD MOVED INTO YOUR TRAILER.
translation.ko: 어떤 새끼가 네 트레일러로 이사 왔어

translation.en: I TRIED TO STOP HIM, BUT I COULDN´T.
translation.ko: 못 하게 하려고 했는데 잘 안 됐어

translation.en: YEAH, CYRUS.
HE KEEPS STICKING A FUCKING GUN IN MY FACE.
translation.ko: 그 엿 같은 총을 내 얼굴에 겨누고

translation.en: SEE THIS? ALL RIGHT?
OLD MAN GAVE ME THAT WHEN I WAS IN GRADE 7.
translation.ko: 내가 중학교 1학년 때 아버지가 나한테 준 거예요

translation.en: SEEN A LOT OF ACTION.
9 MILLIMETER, SAFETY ALWAYS OFF.
TOLD ME HE WAS PROUD OF ME ONCE.
FUCKING PRICK.
CORY AND TREVOR LET HIM MOVE RIGHT IN. YEAH?
YOU CAN MOVE IN HERE WITH ME IF YOU WANT.
NO, THAT´S ALL RIGHT. THAT´S, YOU KNOW --
I´M GONNA TAKE CARE OF CYRUS, BUT, YOU KNOW -- I THINK YOU SHOULD.
translation.ko: - 사이러스는 알아서 할게 - 그래 처리해야 해

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK I SHOULD DO? WELL, I´LL TELL YOU RIGHT NOW.
I TALKED TO HIM ALREADY A COUPLE OF TIMES, AND HE´S FUCKING SCARED OF YOU.
translation.ko: 내가 걔랑 얘기해 봤는데 널 정말 무서워해

translation.en: HE´S WAITING, WONDERING WHEN YOU´RE COMING HOME.
translation.ko: 기다리면서 네가 언제 집에 오는지 궁금해했어

translation.en: -YEAH? -YEP.
SO ALL I´VE GOT TO DO IS TELL HIM YOU´RE HERE,
translation.ko: 그러니까 내가 그냥 네가 돌아왔다고 얘기할게

translation.en: AND I BET YOU HE FUCKING BOLTS.
I DON´T KNOW IF IT´S GONNA BE THAT EASY,
BUT, YOU KNOW, I JUST GOT TO WATCH IT, MAN.
I´M ON PROBATION, AND, YOU KNOW, I´M NOT GOING BACK TO JAIL.
translation.ko: 난 집행 유예 기간이라 감옥에 돌아가기 싫어

translation.en: YOU WON´T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT THAT. YEAH?
EVERYBODY IN THE FUCKING PARK HATES HIM. YEAH?
LAHEY, EVERYBODY. NOBODY FUCKING LIKES HIM.
translation.ko: 래히랑 모두, 그 녀석을 좋아하는 놈은 없어

translation.en: HE FUCKS EVERYONE OVER.
ALL RIGHT.
-COCKSUCKER. -WELL, MAYBE...
YOU KNOW, IF YOU COULD GET WORD AROUND THE PARK
translation.ko: 네가 파크에 소식을 전할 수 있다면

translation.en: AND, YOU KNOW, TELL EVERYONE I´M THROWING HIM OUT TONIGHT.
translation.ko: 모두에게 내가 그 놈을 던져버릴 거라고 해

translation.en: -YEAH, I CAN DO THAT. -YEAH?
-DON´T YOU WORRY ABOUT THAT. -ALL RIGHT.
I´LL GO AROUND DOOR TO FUCKING DOOR IF I HAVE TO.
ENOUGH OF THAT STUFF, MAN. IT´S JUST GOOD TO SEE YOU.
translation.ko: 그래. 어쨌든 다시 보게 돼서 좋다

translation.en: I HEAR YOU´RE RICKY, JULIAN´S LITTLE JAIL BUDDY.
WHAT ARE YOU FILMING,
MORE EPISODES OF "HAPPY DAYS" THERE, FONZIE?
LISTEN, JUST GIVE ME YOUR FUCKING SMOKES. BUDDY, I JUST GOT OUT OF JAIL, ALL RIGHT?
translation.ko: - 잘 들어, 그냥 담배나 줘 - 지금 막 감옥에서 나왔어

translation.en: I DON´T WANT ANY TROUBLE. PUT THE GUN AWAY.
translation.ko: 문제 일으키고 싶지 않다고 총 치워

translation.en: I MEAN, YOU´RE ON-CAMERA WITH A FUCKING GUN.
I DON´T GIVE A FUCK ABOUT THE CAMERA CREW, OKAY?
JUST GIVE ME YOUR FUCKING SMOKES
OR I´LL PUT A BULLET RIGHT THROUGH YOUR GODDAMN RIB CAGE.
translation.ko: 아니면, 네 갈비뼈 사이로 총알을 박을 거야

translation.en: FOR FUCK´S SAKES!
I´VE GOT FOUR PACKS OF SMOKES, ALL RIGHT? YOU CAN HAVE TWO OF THEM, ALL RIGHT?
translation.ko: 네 갑있어, 알았어? 두 갑 가져가

translation.en: NO, FUCKING THANKS.
IF YOU´RE GONNA SHOOT ME OVER TWO PACKS OF SMOKES,
translation.ko: 담배 두 갑 때문에 날 쏘려면

translation.en: THEN GO AHEAD -- SHOOT ME.
IT´S YOUR LUCKY FUCKING DAY, THEN, ISN´T IT, JAIL BOY?
translation.ko: 너 오늘 정말 운 좋다 그렇지 감방 친구

translation.en: YOU TELL YOUR FRIEND JULIAN TO GET THE FUCK OUT OF THE TRAILER PARK,
translation.ko: 네 친구 줄리안에게 트레일러 파크에서 꺼지라고 해

translation.en: OR HE´LL HAVE CYRUS AND YOU KNOW WHAT TO DEAL WITH.
translation.ko: 아니면, 사이러스를 만나게 될 테니, 무슨 말인지 알지?

translation.en: FUCK OFF SOMEWHERE. I´VE GOT WORK TO DO.
I DON´T EVEN HANG AROUND WITH JULIAN ANYMORE.
WHAT THE FUCK DO YOU THINK YOU´RE DOING?
-WHAT´S THIS? -I´VE COME TO TALK TO LUCY.
translation.ko: - 루시와 이야기 좀 하려고 - 이건 뭐야?

translation.en: DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT. IT´S SOMETHING JULIAN´S DOING.
translation.ko: 신경 쓰지 마 줄리안이 하는 거니까

translation.en: WHAT THAT JULIAN´S DOING?
SARA, IT DOESN´T MATTER. WHERE´S LUCY?
-LUCY´S NOT HERE. -I KNOW SHE´S HERE.
translation.ko: - 루시는 여기 없어 - 여기 있는 거 알아

translation.en: SHE WENT TO THE PARK OR SOMETHING. SHE´S NOT HERE.
SHE JUST SNUCK OUT THE BACK DOOR? SHE DIDN´T SNEAK.
translation.ko: - 뒷문으로 도망갔나? - 그런 짓 안 해

translation.en: SHE WALKED OUT THE FRONT DOOR WITH HER DAUGHTER
-TO GO TO THE PARK. -I´M NOT AN IDIOT.
-SARA, WHO´S AT THE DOOR? -NOBODY´S AT THE DOOR.
-LUCY, IT´S RICKY. -THAT´S NOT LUCY.
CAN I TALK TO YOU FOR A MINUTE, PLEASE?
I DON´T WANT YOU TO COME IN, ESPECIALLY NOT WITH ALL THESE PEOPLE.
translation.ko: 너를 집안으로 들일 수 없어 더군다나 이 사람들 전부랑

translation.en: -COME ON IN, GUYS. -I DON´T WANT YOU TO COME IN.
-DON´T SHOVE ME, SARA. -YOU CAN´T JUST COME BACK HERE
translation.ko: - 나 밀치지 마, 새라 - 맘대로 들어 올 수 없다고

translation.en: -AFTER 18 MONTHS... -DON´T SHOVE ME. ...AND EXPECT TO JUST WALK BACK IN THE HOUSE
LIKE NOTHING HAPPENED, OKAY? WHAT ARE YOU, HER FUCKING BODYGUARD?
translation.ko: - 아무 일도 없던 것처럼 - 넌 뭐야, 보디가드?

translation.en: I´M NOT HER BODYGUARD. I´M HER ROOMMATE.
I´M LIVING HERE, HELPING PAY THE BILLS SINCE YOUR ASS WAS IN JAIL.
translation.ko: 네가 감옥 간 후부터 여기 살며 집세 부담하고 있어

translation.en: WELL, NOW I´M BACK AND I´M GONNA BE PAYING THE BILLS AROUND HERE.
translation.ko: 이제 내가 왔으니 내가 알아서 하지

translation.en: THAT´S WHAT YOU THINK!
HOLY SHIT, YOU LOOK GOOD.
I JUST THOUGHT IT WOULD BE NICE TO SPEND SOME TIME TOGETHER.
I´VE BEEN IN JAIL FOR 18 MONTHS. WELL, YEAH, OKAY.
I´M ONLY GONNA BE HERE TO SLEEP ANYWAY, SO DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.ko: 난 그냥 여기서 잠만 잘게 그러니 걱정하지 마

translation.en: YOU´RE KIDDING.
YOU ARE KIDDING, RIGHT?
WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
UH, LISTEN.
UH, CAN -- KEEP THAT CLOSED.
UM, TRINITY AND I CANNOT HAVE YOU COMING IN AND OUT OF OUR LIVES LIKE THIS.
translation.ko: 네가 이렇게 트리니티와 내 삶에 들락거리게 할 수 없어

translation.en: SO JUST GO STAY WITH RAY.
THIS IS MY DAD´S PLACE.
SOUNDS LIKE HE´S DRUNK AGAIN, SO...
translation.ko: 취하신 것 같네요 아버지가 취했을 때는

translation.en: I LEARNED FROM MY DAD THE BEST THING TO DO WHEN HE´S DRUNK
translation.ko: 떨어져 있는 게 최고라는 걸 알게 되었죠

translation.en: I´D RATHER SLEEP IN THE PLAYGROUND TONIGHT.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤은 놀이터에서 자는 게 낫겠네요

translation.en: AS MUCH AS I WANT TO GET DRUNK, I´M NOT GOING IN THERE.
THERE COULD BE WOMEN. GOD KNOWS WHAT´S GOING ON, SO...
translation.ko: 여자가 있을 수도 있고 하느님만 아시겠지만...

translation.en: HAVE TO FIND SOMEWHERE ELSE TO GO, BOYS.
YOU GOT A 10-8 THERE?
10-8? YOU GOT A 10-2?
Randy here. All systems clear.
10-4, RANDY.
YOU KNOW, I ORDINARILY DON´T LIKE TO DO THIS,
BUT I GOT TO CALL THE COPS.
THERE´S A POTENTIAL SHOOTOUT
GONNA BE HAPPENING IN THE TRAILER PARK TONIGHT,
AND -- AND I´M GONNA CALL IN THE HEAVIES.
translation.ko: 그래서 무장 경관 지원 요청해야 해요

translation.en: YOU KNOW, THAT´S REALLY UNFAIR, MR. LAHEY.
JULIAN´S ON PROBATION.
HE COULD GO BACK TO JAIL FOR A REALLY LONG TIME.
translation.ko: 감옥으로 다시 돌아가 오래 수감될지도 몰라요

translation.en: YEAH, JULIAN´S ON PROBATION.
CYRUS ISN´T. CYRUS WILL KILL ME.
translation.ko: 사이러스는 아니지 사이러스가 날 죽일 거라고

translation.en: YOU GOT ANY BETTER IDEAS?
IF NOT, PUT YOUR SHIRT ON AND SHUT UP.
YOU KNOW, THERE´S A LOT OF DIFFERENT PERSONALITIES
HERE IN THIS TRAILER PARK, AND EVERY SINGLE PERSON TRIES
translation.ko: 여기 파크에서는 모두 서로를 존중하려 해요

translation.en: TO RESPECT EACH OTHER, EXCEPT FOR CYRUS.
HE HAS NO RESPECT FOR ANYONE BUT HIMSELF.
translation.ko: 그 놈은 자기만 알고 다른 사람은 존중하지 않죠

translation.en: AND I DON´T REALLY WANT TO CALL THE POLICE IN HERE,
AND CONVINCED MR. LAHEY NOT TO,
BECAUSE I FEEL THAT IN THIS COMMUNITY,
WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO WORK THINGS OUT OURSELVES.
CYRUS AIN´T FROM THE PARK, YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN?
translation.ko: 사이러스는 파크 출신 아니죠 무슨 말인지 알죠?

translation.en: ´ROUND HERE, IT´S ALL FOR ALL AND ONE FOR ONE.
translation.ko: 여기는 모두가 서로 위하고 각자가 각자를 위해요

translation.en: -THAT´S RIGHT. -YEAH, MAN.
MOTHERFUCKERS WHO AIN´T FROM THE PARK,
THEY DON´T UNDERSTAND THE WAY SHIT GOES DOWN,
LIKE THE "J" TO THE R-O-C AND LIKE TYRONE DOES, MY MAN HERE.
-YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING. -YEAH.
WHEN YOU´RE FROM THE PARK, IT´S ALL FOR ONE MOTHERFUCKER
AND ONE MOTHERFUCKER FOR ALL MO´FUCKERS EVERYWHERE,
YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
BUT IF YOU COME FROM OUTSIDE THE PARK, YOU BETTER WATCH OUT,
translation.ko: 하지만 파크 밖 출신은 지켜봐야 해요

translation.en: ´CAUSE YOU GOT A WHOLE BUNCH OF PARK HUSTLERS ON YOUR JOCK.
THAT STICK TOGETHER, TOO. IT´S LIKE A FAMILY.
WELL, YOUR JOCK DON´T STICK TOGETHER, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING, BUT THE PEOPLE STICK TOGETHER.
translation.ko: 바보들은 뭉칠 줄 모르죠 인간들은 뭉칠 줄 알아요

translation.en: THAT´S THE SHIT I´M TALKING ABOUT.
EVERY DAY MR. LAHEY AND I CLEAN UP THIS PLAYGROUND.
translation.ko: 매일 래히 씨와 제가 이 놀이터를 청소하죠

translation.en: RANDY, WE HAVE COMPANY.
OH, SHIT, IT´S CYRUS.
WHAT´S THIS -- DON´T YOU MOVE!
WHAT´S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU CALLING THE COPS, HUH?
WHAT´S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU CALLING THE COPS?
NOW, LISTEN, THERE´S PEOPLE WHO LIVE AROUND HERE.
JUST TAKE IT EASY, WILL YOU, CYRUS?
I´LL FUCKING MAKE THE DECISIONS AROUND HERE.
YOU GOT THAT, OLD MAN?
JUST BACK OFF, CYRUS.
TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF ME, SASQUATCH!
NOW, LISTEN -- YOU LISTEN TO ME, OLD MAN.
YOU CALL THE COPS, AND I´LL MAKE AN EXAMPLE OF YOU.
YOU UNDERSTAND ME?
WHAT´S THAT SUPPOSED TO MEAN, CYRUS?
BANG! DO I GOT TO SPELL IT FOR YOU?
NOW SAY YOU´RE SORRY. I´M SORRY.
KISS MY HAND. I´M NOT KISSING YOUR HAND.
KISS MY HAND.
DO IT.
ALL RIGHT, FUCK OFF. I´VE GOT WORK TO DO.
REMEMBER WHAT I SAID.
OH, MY GOD.
ME AND JULIAN COULD DEFINITELY TAKE CARE OF THE CYRUS THING.
translation.ko: 줄리안과 제가 사이러스를 해결할 수 있어요

translation.en: IT´S JUST THAT, NUMBER ONE, WE´RE ON PROBATION,
WHICH IS NO BIG DEAL, BUT, YOU KNOW,
I DON´T REALLY WANT TO GO BACK TO JAIL.
AND NUMBER TWO OR THREE OR WHATEVER NUMBER WE´RE ON,
translation.ko: 둘째, 혹은 셋째 번호 매기기 나름이지만

translation.en: I´M NOT GOING BACK TO JAIL FOR JULIAN
translation.ko: 줄리안 때문에 감옥 가진 않을 겁니다

translation.en: BECAUSE I DON´T EVEN HANG AROUND WITH HIM ANYMORE.
translation.ko: 왜냐하면 더는 같이 어울려 다니지도 않으니까요

translation.en: WE´VE GOT TO MAKE A FEW THINGS CLEAR. SURE.
THE TWO OF US CAN´T LIVE IN THIS TRAILER PARK TOGETHER, NOW, CAN WE?
translation.ko: 우리 둘이 같이 트레일러 파크에 있을 순 없지?

translation.en: RIGHT, SO I GUESS SOMEONE´S GOT TO MOVE. THAT´S WHAT I´M TALKING ABOUT.
HEY, THAT´S MY SHIT!
HEY, THAT´S MY SHIT!
THAT´S MY SHIT!
OBVIOUSLY YOU DIDN´T HEAR ME WHEN I SAID CLEAR OUT YOUR OWN SHIT.
translation.ko: 네 걸 챙기라는 소릴 못 알아먹은 게 틀림없군

translation.en: NOW, I WANT A NEW TV.
I WANT A VCR, AND I WANT MY PORN TAPES REPLACED
BECAUSE THOSE WERE THE CRÈME DE LA CRÈME.
I WANT YOU OUT OF THIS PARK.
[ SCOFFS ] I´M NOT LEAVING.
I PROVIDE A SERVICE FOR THESE GOOD PEOPLE.
THEY´RE LIKE MY FAMILY.
TELL HIM, PEOPLE. GO ON.
A SHOW OF HANDS, THOSE WHO NEED HIS DOPE.
I´D LIKE TO TAKE THIS OPPORTUNITY
TO LET EVERYBODY KNOW THAT ME AND TYRONE´S OPEN FOR BUSINESS.
WE CAN SERVICE ALL YOUR DOPE NEEDS.
translation.ko: 너희에게 마리화나 우리가 공급할 수 있어

translation.en: GOOD PRICES, TOO, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
SEE, WE DON´T NEED YOU HERE.
WELL, I´M NOT LEAVING.
AND I´M NOT AFRAID TO USE THIS GUN.
translation.ko: 난 이 총 사용하는 거 두렵지 않아

translation.en: I THINK YOU´RE AFRAID. FUCK AFRAID!
YOU THINK I WON´T PULL THE TRIGGER?
translation.ko: 내가 방아쇠를 못 당길 것 같아?

translation.en: MY BRAIN TELLS MY FINGER TO PULL THE TRIGGER, AND BOOM!
translation.ko: 내 뇌가 내 손가락에게 당겨라 명령하면, 빵!

translation.en: HAPPENS JUST LIKE THAT. WELL, LET ME TALK TO YOUR BRAIN, THEN.
translation.ko: - 그렇게 된다고 - 네 뇌에 말 좀 하자

translation.en: HEY, CYRUS´S BRAIN, PULL THE TRIGGER!
OH, FUNNY GUY.
PULL THE TRIGGER! DO IT!
DO IT!
[ SCOFFS ] YOU´RE NOT GONNA DO IT, MAN. CYRUS, YOU FUCKING DICK!
SHUT UP!
WHY DON´T YOU DO YOURSELF A FAVOR?
YOU´RE NOT FROM THE PARK, MAN. YOU DON´T BELONG HERE.
translation.ko: 넌 여기 출신 아니야 여기 소속이 아니라고

translation.en: THIS IS MY FAMILY.
WHY DON´T YOU GET OUT OF HERE?
I DON´T NEED THIS SHIT ANYWAY.
CHUMP CHANGE.
THANKS FOR GETTING RID OF CYRUS FOR US, JULIAN.
NOW IF YOU COULD JUST HELP STRAIGHTEN RICKY OUT,
WE´D BE ALL SET.
ALL RIGHT, EVERYBODY, PARTY´S OVER.
LET´S GO HOME.
WELCOME BACK, JULIAN.
FUCK OFF, MR. LAHEY!
COME ON, RANDY. LET´S GO WRITE THIS UP.
ALL IN ALL, I THINK WE HAD A PRETTY GOOD DAY TODAY, GUYS.
IT´S TIME TO HAVE A FEW DRINKS, SIT DOWN, TURN THAT THING OFF.
translation.ko: 몇 잔 마실 시간이니 그거 끄고 앉아서 마셔요

translation.en: MAN, I´M SORRY TO INTERRUPT YOUR TV SHOW.
I´VE GOT NOWHERE TO GO, JULIAN.
ME AND LUCY ARE ALL DONE, AND MY DAD´S DRUNK.
I WAS JUST WONDERING IF I COULD MAYBE SLEEP IN YOUR CAR OR SOMETHING, MAN.
translation.ko: 네 차 안에서 좀 자면 안 될까?

translation.en: I GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
THANKS, JULIAN.
I CAN´T BELIEVE HE´S STILL OUT THERE.
FOR THE PAST 18 MONTHS, I PROMISED MYSELF TO STAY AWAY FROM HIM.
I DON´T KNOW. HE´S A GOOD GUY.
TAKE IT EASY, JULIAN. I´M LEAVING.
-RELAX, RICKY, RELAX. -I JUST GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
translation.ko: - 아니야, 리키, 진정해 - 갈 데가 없어서

translation.en: HERE, I GOT YOU SOME HOT DOGS.
I GOT YOU SOME VODKA.
I APPRECIATE THIS, JULIAN, BUT, I MEAN, I DON´T NEED YOUR CHARITY.
translation.ko: 고마워, 줄리안, 하지만 난 네 자선 필요 없어

translation.en: RICKY, IT´S OKAY, ALL RIGHT?
HERE, YOU CAN SLEEP IN THE CAR FOR TWO DAYS.
translation.ko: 차 안에 이틀 정도 잘 수 있어

translation.en: THANKS, BUDDY. I APPRECIATE THAT.
I WANT YOU OUT OF THAT CAR IN TWO DAYS, THOUGH, RICKY, ALL RIGHT?
translation.ko: 이틀 후에는 차에서 나가 줘, 리키, 알겠지?

translation.en: NO MORE THAN TWO WEEKS. I PROMISE, ALL RIGHT?
translation.ko: 이 주 후에 나갈게 약속할게, 알았지?
